messages.body:
Hello,

 We only offer 2 shelves per unit if they are in stock. We also suggest that you use the wall attachment strap for reasons of safety.

Thank you for your email.

To have a replacement part order placed for you, please provide the following information:

1) The full original address and full name  to which the order shipped—And the address you’d like the part(s) sent to if they differ
2) A phone number we can add to the order should we have any questions
3) The part number and desired quantities
4) The Bestar model number
5) Where you purchased Ex: Costco, directly from Bestar, WalMart, Amazon, etc.

If the parts are in stock, we would create an order and place it on hold. We would reach out with a quote and if interested you could make a payment with a credit card over the phone. Let's start the process by providing the information above.

Thank you,

David S.
Consumer Service Representative

messages.body:
Hello
**Diana McAlister,**

Thank you for your email.

To have a replacement part order placed for you, please provide the following information:


1. Full name on the order
2. The full original address to which the order shipped—And the address you’d like the part(s) sent to if they differ
3. The number beginning with A1 or A2 listed on the front cover of the assembly booklet
4. The stamped-on lot code located on either the front or the back of the assembly booklet—typically in blue or black ink
5. A phone number we can add to the order should we have any questions
6. The letter associated with the damaged/missing part(s) that can be found in the instruction booklet on the page with the exploded view--or if it still has the sticker--the full part number beginning with a W or S for a wood piece or an H for a piece of hardware.
7. The Bush Industries Model #--this is typically printed on the cardboard box in which you received the unit.

Thank you,

![esolutions furniture](https://esolutionsfurniture.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/logo50.png)

David S.
Consumer Service Representative

eSolutions Furniture
Creating spaces. Enriching lives.

## **Please share your feedback with us**



Hi there,



You recently engaged with our support team on ticket** ****SCT-2641043****.**** **

If for any reason your ticket was not resolved, please respond via Partner Home and we will be happy to help. Please do not reply to this email as responses will not go directly to customers.

My Account

Dear Wayfair Partner,



Thanks for your update on SCT-2668117. Please find the following information on expectations involving discount to keep (partial refund) or full refund:

-

DTK - The maximum discount that can be offered is up to 25%, but we encourage you to use increments of 15%, 20%, or 25%.

  -

Discounts should only be offered in percentages and not dollar amounts, and processed through Partner Home.

-

Refund - Full refunds that require return need to be processed through Wayfair. Please loop in the Wayfair team to do so and confirm with the customer.

  -

Only offer refunds in a true post order issue (damage, damage in transit, defect, wrong product, missing parts) and if it is anything else (such as buyer’s remorse) loop in the Wayfair team via internal comments on the ticket.

If you have any questions or need further clarification, please do not hesitate to contactwfsuppliertransfers@wayfair.com.

Kind regards,

Wayfair Supplier Transfer Program Team

 ![Wayfair Partner](https://secure.img1-fg.wfcdn.com/dm/image/c6a70f39-622d-445c-bd05-02c03e3be39e/wayfair_partner_rgb_purple.jpg)

  ­ ͏ ‌     ­ ͏ ‌     ­ ͏ ‌     ­ ͏ ‌     ­  My Account  Dear Wayfair Partner,     Thanks for your update on SCT-2668117. Please find the following information on expectations involving discount to keep (partial refund) or full refund:    DTK - The maximum discount that can be offered is up to 25%, but we encourage you to use increments of 15%, 20%, or 25%.    Discounts should only be offered in percentages and not dollar amounts, and processed through Partner Home.      Refund - Full refunds that require return need to be processed through Wayfair. Please loop in the Wayfair team to do so and confirm with the customer.    Only offer refunds in a true post order issue (damage, damage in transit, defect, wrong product, missing parts) and if it is anything else (such as buyer’s remorse) loop in the Wayfair team via internal comments on the ticket.      If you have any questions or need further clarification, please do not hesitate to contactwfsuppliertransfers@wayfair.com.  Kind regards,  Wayfair Supplier Transfer Program Team  Account     |     Help Center     |     Your Dashboard     |     Privacy Policy  This message was sent to , .

## Ticket Closed - Customer Unresponsive

##

My Account

Ticket Closed - Customer Unresponsive

 

Hi there,

 

Ticket SCT-2661385, waiting on a customer response, has been pending for more than 72 hours. We’ve sent the customer several reminders but they still have not responded, therefore Wayfair has closed this ticket.

You can still access this request on Partner Home wherever you view closed tickets. If the customer responds the ticket will be re-opened. Please do not reply to this email as responses will not go directly to customers. 

Thank you,

Wayfair

messages.body:
Greetings from Amazon.com. 

We're sorry. You've written to an address that cannot accept incoming
e-mail.

Please refer to the response we sent you and use the links at the end of
our message to send us more information so that we may resolve your issue. 
This will help us to associate your message with your previous
correspondence.

If there are no links in the message you received, or if you need to
contact us about a different issue, please visit
http://www.amazon.com/contact-us to send e-mail to customer service.
Please be sure to use the e-mail address associated with your Amazon.com
account when you contact us.

Thank you for shopping at Amazon.com.

Sincerely,
Amazon.com Customer Service
http://www.amazon.com/

messages.plainBody:
Greetings from Amazon.com.  

 We're sorry. You've written to an address that cannot accept incoming

e-mail. 

 Please refer to the response we sent you and use the links at the end of

our message to send us more information so that we may resolve your issue. 

This will help us to associate your message with your previous

correspondence. 

 If there are no links in the message you received, or if you need to

contact us about a different issue, please visit

http://www.amazon.com/contact-us to send e-mail to customer service.

Please be sure to use the e-mail address associated with your Amazon.com

account when you contact us. 

 Thank you for shopping at Amazon.com. 

 Sincerely,

Amazon.com Customer Service

## Ticket Closed - Customer Unresponsive

##

Hi there,



Ticket **SCT-2655697**, waiting on a customer response, has been pending for more than 72 hours. We’ve sent the customer several reminders but they still have not responded, therefore Wayfair has closed this ticket.

You can still access this request on **Partner Home** wherever you view closed tickets. If the customer responds the ticket will be re-opened. Please do not reply to this email as responses will not go directly to customers.

Thank you,

Wayfair

# Staples Professional / Staples Professionnel

www.StaplesProfessional.ca



This email is an automated notification which is unable to receive replies. We're happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have. Please contact us directly by sending an email to: patricia.rimeikis@staples.ca.

messages.body:
Hi consumer service!
I need a desk leg for one of our slate/white Spectrum desks. I have tried to call your parts number numerous times with no success on getting through.
Would love to get this ordered, could someone contact me with pricing and stock?
Thank you so much!
Best Regards,
Vickie Combs

My Account

Ticket Closed - Customer Unresponsive

 

Hi there,

 

Ticket SCT-2660810, waiting on a customer response, has been pending for more than 72 hours. We’ve sent the customer several reminders but they still have not responded, therefore Wayfair has closed this ticket.

You can still access this request on Partner Home wherever you view closed tickets. If the customer responds the ticket will be re-opened. Please do not reply to this email as responses will not go directly to customers. 

Thank you,

Wayfair

My Account

Please share your feedback with us

 

Hi there,

 

You recently engaged with our support team on ticket SCT-2672058. 

 

Please take a moment to rate your experience by simply clicking on the star that best reflects your sentiment below, and you'll be directed to a short one-minute survey. 

 

How satisfied are you with the assistance provided by the Wayfair Support Team? 

Your feedback matters to us and helps us improve your experience.

 

If for any reason your ticket was not resolved, please respond via Partner Home and we will be happy to help. Please do not reply to this email as responses will not go directly to customers.

 

Ticket Title: Customer Service Cold Transfer

Description: 

Wayfair Order Number: 4461690443
Wayfair PO Number: CS613039865
Order Product/Item: 11576565933
Supplier SKU: WC31066
Delivery Date: 2025-10-06T11:07-04:00
Customer Name: William D Elmore
Customer Shipping Address: 13016 Observation Circle Apt 305,Louisville,KY 40243
Quantity: 1
Issue Type: Missing Parts (Report a Problem)
Describe missing part: Most of the parts are there, but the instructions mention nails which are no where to be found. The instructions list them as part H34174 and there are supposed to be 34 of them.
Photos will be uploaded to this ticket within the next 2 hours.

 Thanks,

Wayfair Partner Support

## Ticket Closed - Customer Unresponsive

##

Hi there,



Ticket **SCT-2672058**, waiting on a customer response, has been pending for more than 72 hours. We’ve sent the customer several reminders but they still have not responded, therefore Wayfair has closed this ticket.

You can still access this request on **Partner Home** wherever you view closed tickets. If the customer responds the ticket will be re-opened. Please do not reply to this email as responses will not go directly to customers.

Thank you,

Wayfair

#### **ACTION REQUIRED:**

##### TO DO

#####

#####

##### **Please Credit Wayfair**

#####

##### Upon receipt and inspection of returned items, please credit Wayfair

#####

##### To provide credit memos and invoices, email **accounting@wayfair.com**

#### RETURN DETAILS

##### PO Number

##### Reason for Return

##### FedEx

FURTHER INFO & HELP LINKS

##### **HELP:** **Help Center** | **Wayfair Internal Contacts**



##### **RESET PASSWORD:** If you’ve forgotten your login credentials they can be reset **here**.



##### **CREATE ACCOUNT:** If you need to create an account, someone at your company can grant you access by going to **User** **Management** and clicking the “Create New” button.



##### **QUESTIONS:** If you have questions, please log onto Wayfair Partner Home and open a ticket.

##

Hi there,



Ticket **SCT-2658907**, waiting on a customer response, has been pending for more than 72 hours. We’ve sent the customer several reminders but they still have not responded, therefore Wayfair has closed this ticket.

You can still access this request on **Partner Home** wherever you view closed tickets. If the customer responds the ticket will be re-opened. Please do not reply to this email as responses will not go directly to customers.

Thank you,

Wayfair

## Ticket Closed - Customer Unresponsive

##

Hi there,



Ticket **SCT-2654107**, waiting on a customer response, has been pending for more than 72 hours. We’ve sent the customer several reminders but they still have not responded, therefore Wayfair has closed this ticket.

You can still access this request on **Partner Home** wherever you view closed tickets. If the customer responds the ticket will be re-opened. Please do not reply to this email as responses will not go directly to customers.

Thank you,

Wayfair
